qrUrlBase: QR Stamp Info page url base
this should be a valid public web site url
which can be accessed via HTTPS.
but while developing leave it default
then 'localhost' would be replaced by the hostname.
organizationName: name of your organization such as
representativeName: usually the name of your companys president

config.organizationName: QR角印サンプル株式会社
config.representativeName: 代表取締役 角田 印
